title: Adam Scott to be honored with Webby Award for Apple TV+ hit Severance
content:
Apple TV+ is about to add a Webby Award to its long-running list of accolades. At the 26th Annual Webby Awards, Adam Scott, star of Severance, is going to receive the honor as Webby Best Actor. The hit series will be features at the in-person event in New York City on May 16. 

more…

The post Adam Scott to be honored with Webby Award for Apple TV+ hit Severance appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple TV+ is about to add a Webby Award to its long-running list of accolades at the 26th Annual Webby Awards.
